scripts.bump: npm install --legacy-peer-deps $(cat package.json | jq -r '((.dependencies, .devDependencies) | keys) - ((.skipBump // {}) | keys) | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}') && npm audit fix || exit 0
scripts.postbump: cat package.json | jq '. + (.dependencies = ((.dependencies + (.localPeerDepedencies // {})) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries)) | (.devDependencies = ((.devDependencies + (.localPeerDevDepedencies // {})) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries))' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
scripts.prebump: cat package.json | jq '(((.localPeerDepedencies // {}) | keys | map(["dependencies", .])) + ((.localPeerDevDepedencies // {}) | keys | map(["devDependencies", .]))) as $localPeerPaths | delpaths($localPeerPaths)' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
